medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe abdominal pain with a syncopal episode.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing abdominal pain while at church, shortly after eating a small lunch. He felt very weak and had a syncopal episode that was witnessed. Upon arrival at the emergency department, he reported severe back pain in addition to upper abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Traumatic brain injury, insomnia, hyperlipidemia, umbilical hernia, H. pylori, chronic polyps, diabetes mellitus type II. Previous surgical history includes umbilical herniorrhaphy.
